name: Hunt the Monsters:AR
description:
This is Augmented Reality Shooting Game.

Here you have to Kill the Monsters using your phone and save the Hero. 

This is game is developed under 24 hours using Unity3D and Vuforia. 

How to Play.

  1. Download the target  image and print it on a paper(Or you can view it in a monitor or tablet)
  2. Download the Game(In Android Phone).
  3. Scan the target image with your phone and play the game.

Please sent us a email if any bugs found.
